Title: Echoes of Starlight
Author: Marcus L. Chen
Description: An epic space opera following a diverse crew of explorers who discover an ancient alien artifact that could change humanity's understanding of the universe.

Title: The Forgotten Garden
Author: Sophia K. Williams
Description: A lyrical tale of family secrets spanning three generations, centered around a mysterious walled garden on an English estate.

Title: Quantum Paradox
Author: Alexander J. Thompson
Description: A mind-bending thriller where a physicist discovers her research has been weaponized, forcing her to confront ethical dilemmas while being hunted by government agents.

Title: Whispers in the Willow
Author: Natalie P. Blackwood
Description: A haunting tale set in rural Vermont where a young artist inherits a cottage with a mysterious past and discovers she can communicate with spirits through her paintings.

Title: The Economics of Everything
Author: Daniel R. Morrison
Description: An accessible exploration of how economic principles shape everyday decisions, from dating to career choices, written with humor and practical insights.
